text: James Ewell Brown Stuart (1833-1864) was a general in the Confederate army during the American Civil War. He was from Virginia. During the war, he was known for dangerous things he did while riding a horse. He was killed at the Battle of Yellow Tavern in 1864. ==Sources== Category:1833 births Category:1864 deaths Category:Confederate Army generals Category:Military people from Virginia
title: J.E.B. Stuart
